description:
I'd like to address the hysteria surrounding the #CoronaVirus because people are beyond consumed with the #FearPorn being shoved down their throats right now that they don't take the time to look rationally at the situation.
.
The virus itself is little more then the average flu, which while unpleasant, is not the end of the world for anyone with a even partially healthy immune system, which is nearly everyone.
.
If you are truly concerned with not being able to survive something equivalent to the flu, you should consider adopting a healthier lifestyle which would allow your body and immune system to function optimally so that viruses wouldn't be such a threat to your well being.
.
How this virus came to be and the many rabbit holes surrounding it is for another post but as for your personal wellbeing; this is nothing to fear, unless like with any other illness, you are someone with preexisting health issue such as a vacinated child, person with chronic disease or elderly person who is already not in good health(also consider how alkaline or acidic your diet is 🔑).
.
All this to say, don't buy into the #fearmongering
& #propaganda because it's not doing you or your immune system any good and really doesn't deserve your focus or energy in the first place but here are 4 BASIC things you can do to increase your overall health so that like me, you don't give a f#%k about #TheCoronaVirus 👼🏻
.
1. EAT ORGANIC & RAW FRUITS, VEGETABLES & GREENS AS WELL AS SUPERFOODS, HERBS AND NATURAL SUPPLEMENTS 🥝🥗🍵
2. DRINK IONIZED ALKALINE OR FRESH SPRING WATER 💧💦🌊
3. EXERCISE DAILY 🏃🏻🏋🏽💃
4. GET SUNLIGHT ✨🌞✨
